title: move expand / expand_as to C
body_html:
Right now, just like .view, this function gets used A LOT, but it's in python, so has been reported as a hotspot.

Similar to moving view into TH/THC, do the same for expand.
torch/torch7#926

Note that expand in pytorch has broadcasting semantics, i.e. you can add singleton dimensions at the front.
Here's the code: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/tensor.py#L208-L265

Docs have to be moved to torch/_tensor_docs.py.
body_text:

torch/torch7#926
Note that expand in pytorch has broadcasting semantics, i.e. you can add singleton dimensions at the front.
Here's the code: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/tensor.py#L208-L265
Docs have to be moved to torch/_tensor_docs.py.
body:
Right now, just like `.view`, this function gets used A LOT, but it's in python, so has been reported as a hotspot.

Similar to moving view into TH/THC, do the same for expand.
https://github.com/torch/torch7/pull/926

Note that `expand` in pytorch has broadcasting semantics, i.e. you can add singleton dimensions at the front.
Here's the code: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/tensor.py#L208-L265

Docs have to be moved to `torch/_tensor_docs.py`.
